trans-unit.source: Represents a node in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控件中的节点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is made up of nodes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件组成的节点。

trans-unit.source: Each entry in the tree is called a node and is represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 在树中的每个条目都称为一个节点，它由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象。

trans-unit.source: A node that contains other nodes is called a *parent node*.
trans-unit.target: 包含其他节点的节点称为*父节点*。

trans-unit.source: A node that is contained by another node is called a *child node*.
trans-unit.target: 包含的另一个节点的节点称为*子节点*。

trans-unit.source: A node that has no child nodes is called a *leaf node*.
trans-unit.target: 没有子节点的节点称为*叶节点*。

trans-unit.source: A node that is not contained by any other node but is the ancestor to all the other nodes is the *root node*.
trans-unit.target: 不包含任何其他节点但它是到所有其他节点的上级的节点是*根节点*。

trans-unit.source: A node can be both a parent and a child, but root, parent, and leaf nodes are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: 节点可以是父级和子级，但根，父级，和叶节点是互相排斥。

trans-unit.source: Several visual and behavioral properties of nodes are determined by whether a node is a *root*, *parent*, or *leaf* node.
trans-unit.target: 由多个视觉和行为属性，节点的节点是否*根*，*父*，或*叶*节点。

trans-unit.source: Although a typical tree has only one root node, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control allows you to add multiple root nodes to your tree structure.
trans-unit.target: 虽然典型树只包含一个根节点，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件，可将多个根节点添加到你树结构。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to display item listings without displaying a single main root node, as in a list of product categories.
trans-unit.target: 当你想要显示项列表而不显示单个主根节点，如下所示的产品类别列表时，这非常有用。

trans-unit.source: A node primarily stores data in two properties, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 节点主要在两个属性中存储数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property is used to store any additional data about the node, such as data used for handling postback events.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>属性显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件，与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>属性用来存储有关该节点，如用于处理回发事件数据的任何其他数据。

trans-unit.source: A node also stores the path from the node to its root node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 节点还存储中其根节点的路径从节点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A> property indicates the node's position relative to the root node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A>属性指示相对于根节点的节点的位置。

trans-unit.source: Nodes at the same level must each have a unique value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property; the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control cannot distinguish between different nodes at the same level that have the same value.
trans-unit.target: 在同一级别的节点必须每个具有唯一值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>属性;<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件无法区分具有相同的值的不同节点在同一级别。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, if the user clicks a node that has a duplicate value, the node that appears first in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is selected.
trans-unit.target: 在此方案中，如果用户单击的节点具有重复的值，该节点，会显示在第一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件被选定。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object is made up of the following four user interface (UI) elements, which can be customized or hidden:
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象由以下四个用户界面 (UI) 元素，可以自定义或隐藏组成：

trans-unit.source: An expansion node indicator icon used to show whether the node is expanded, collapsed, or non-expandable.
trans-unit.target: 扩展节点指示器图标来显示该节点是展开、 折叠的还是非可展开。

trans-unit.source: An optional check box associated with the node.
trans-unit.target: 一个可选的复选框，可与节点关联。

trans-unit.source: An optional node image.
trans-unit.target: 可选节点映像。

trans-unit.source: The node text.
trans-unit.target: 节点的文本。

trans-unit.source: You can specify a custom image for the expandable, collapsible, and non-expandable node indicators by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> class.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置指定可展开、 折叠的和非可展开的节点指标所指示的自定义映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>类。

trans-unit.source: The expansion node indicator icons can even be hidden entirely by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> class to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 甚至可以完全由设置隐藏起来扩展节点指示器图标<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>类到`false`。

trans-unit.source: To display a check box next to a node, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示的节点旁边的复选框，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>类。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A> property is set to a value other than `TreeNodeType.Node`, check boxes are displayed next to the specified node type.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>属性设置为值`TreeNodeType.Node`，指定的节点类型旁显示复选框。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override the check box of an individual node by setting the node's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过设置该节点的有选择地覆盖的单个节点的复选框<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When a check box is displayed, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property to determine whether the check box is selected.
trans-unit.target: 显示一个复选框时，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Checked%2A>属性来确定是否选中复选框。

trans-unit.source: You can display an image in a node by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在节点中显示图像，通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This image is displayed next to the node text.
trans-unit.target: 节点文本旁会显示此图像。

trans-unit.source: The text of a node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control can be in one of two modes: selection mode or navigation mode.
trans-unit.target: 中的节点的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件可以在两种模式之一中： 选择模式或导航模式。

trans-unit.source: By default, a node is in selection mode.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，一个节点处于选择模式。

trans-unit.source: To put a node into navigation mode, set the node's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property to a value other than an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 若要将节点放入导航模式下，将设置该节点的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>为空字符串以外的值的属性 ("")。

trans-unit.source: To put a node into selection mode, set the node's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 若要使一个节点处于选择模式，设置该节点的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>属性为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Some Internet browsers have a limitation that can affect the performance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 某些 Internet 浏览器有可能会影响的性能限制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 has a URL character limit of 2067 characters that it posts.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 具有的 URL 字符限制为发的 2067年字符。

trans-unit.source: If the number of characters in a URL of a node is larger than that number, expanding that node will fail and no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个节点的 URL 中的字符数大于该数字，展开该节点将失败，并且不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: By default, clicking a node that is in selection mode posts the page back to the server and raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，单击某个节点在选择模式下将页面回发到服务器并引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally specify a different event to raise by setting the node's `SelectAction` property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择指定一个不同的事件，通过设置该节点的引发`SelectAction`属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To determine which node was clicked in selection mode, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定在选择模式下被单击的节点，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: When a node is in navigation mode, all selection events are disabled for that node.
trans-unit.target: 在导航模式下一个节点时，将对该节点禁用所选内容的所有事件。

trans-unit.source: Clicking the node in navigation mode directs the user to the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 单击导航模式中的节点将定向到指定的 URL 的用户。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property to specify the window or frame in which to display the linked content.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择性地设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>属性指定的窗口或框架中显示的链接的内容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> class contains several properties that are used to store the state of the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>类包含用于存储节点的状态的多个属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Selected%2A> property to determine whether a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Selected%2A>属性来确定节点是否处于选定状态。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the node is expanded, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否已展开节点，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.DataBound%2A> property is used to determine whether a node is bound to data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.DataBound%2A>属性用于确定节点是否已绑定到数据。

trans-unit.source: When a node is bound to data, you can access the underlying data item by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.DataItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当节点绑定到数据时，你可以通过使用访问基础数据项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.DataItem%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The class provides several properties that help to determine the position of a node relative to other nodes in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供有助于确定相对于其他节点的节点在树中的位置的多个属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Depth%2A> property to determine the depth of the node.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Depth%2A>属性来确定节点的深度。

trans-unit.source: You can get the delimited list of nodes from the current node to its root node by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以获取节点的分隔的列表从当前节点到其根节点通过使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To determine the node's parent node, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Parent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定在节点的父节点，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Parent%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Child nodes are accessed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用访问子节点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input.
trans-unit.target: 有时，它是不可行静态预定义树形结构由于数据大小或依赖于用户输入的自定义内容。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control supports dynamic node population.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件支持动态节点填充。

trans-unit.source: A node can be populated at run time when it is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 可以在运行时它展开时填充一个节点。

trans-unit.source: Note that you can get unexpected behavior if you persist asynchronously created nodes.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，是否仍存在以异步方式创建的节点，你可以获得意外的行为。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you use a background worker thread to populate nodes asynchronously, the node tree might not be populated immediately though the control proceeds with the rest of the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你使用后台辅助线程以异步方式填充节点，节点树可能不会填充立即尽管控件可以继续处理页的生命周期的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: On postback, the delayed creation of the nodes can cause problems when the control's view state is loaded but the node tree is not fully populated.
trans-unit.target: 在回发时，延迟的创建节点会导致问题时已加载控件的视图状态，但不是完全填充节点树。

trans-unit.source: For more information on dynamic node population, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关动态节点填充的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置下一个代码示例的帧。

trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数时中的所有属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象设置为其默认值。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to set the properties, as necessary, after creating the object.
trans-unit.target: 请务必设置属性，如有必要，创建对象之后。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> that will contain the new <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" />，它将包含新的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> is a root node; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 是根节点，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the node's check box is selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示节点的复选框是否被选中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the node's check box is selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果节点的复选框被选中，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When a node displays a check box, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property is commonly used to specify whether the check box is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果节点显示一个复选框，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Checked%2A>属性通常用于指定是否被选中复选框。

trans-unit.source: When the check box associated with a node is selected, the node is automatically added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CheckedNodes%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 选中与节点关联的复选框后，自动将节点添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CheckedNodes%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property can also be used to determine whether the check box is selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Checked%2A>属性还可以用于确定是否选中复选框。

trans-unit.source: It is more common to determine which nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control have their check boxes selected by iterating through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CheckedNodes%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 它是更常见的是确定在哪个节点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件具有通过循环访问选中其复选框<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CheckedNodes%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property to specify whether a node's check box is selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Checked%2A>属性指定指示是否选定节点的复选框。

trans-unit.source: It initializes the check boxes of nodes with a depth of one to a selected state.
trans-unit.target: 它将初始化具有一个为选中状态深度节点的复选框。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Newsgroup.xml.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Newsgroup.xml 文件。

trans-unit.source: The following code is sample XML data for the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码是前面的示例的示例 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection" /> collection that contains the first-level child nodes of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection" /> 集合，该集合包含当前节点的第一级子节点。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection" /> that contains the first-level child nodes of the current node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection" />，包含当前节点的第一级子节点。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> property to get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> collection that contains the first-level child nodes of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>属性来获取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>集合，其中包含当前节点的第一级子节点。

trans-unit.source: This collection is commonly used to iterate through all the first-level child nodes, or to access a specific first-level child node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 此集合通常用于循环访问所有第一级子节点，或访问当前节点的特定第一级子节点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> property can also be used to programmatically manage the first-level child nodes in the current node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>属性还可以用于以编程方式管理当前节点中的第一级子节点。

trans-unit.source: You can add, insert, remove, and retrieve <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加、 插入、 删除和检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>从集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: Any updates to the collection will automatically be reflected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control the next time the page is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 对集合的任何更新将自动反映在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制的下次刷新页面。

trans-unit.source: To access child nodes further down the tree, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> property of the next-level child node to navigate down the node levels.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问子节点进一步树向下的，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>属性要导航节点级别下的下一级子节点。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> property to traverse the tree.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>遍历树的属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> class with the properties of the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 用当前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 实例的属性创建 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> with the properties of the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 的新实例，具有当前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> 实例的属性。

trans-unit.source: This is a helper method that supports the <xref:System.ICloneable> interface implemented by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 这是支持一个帮助器方法<xref:System.ICloneable>接口来实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>。

trans-unit.source: Collapses the current tree node.
trans-unit.target: 折叠当前树节点。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Collapse%2A> method to conveniently collapse the current node.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Collapse%2A>可以方便地折叠当前节点的方法。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 作为替代方法，还可以设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: To collapse the current node and all its child nodes, consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.CollapseAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要折叠当前节点及其所有子节点，请考虑使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.CollapseAll%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseAll%2A> will collapse all the nodes in the entire tree.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseAll%2A> 将折叠整个树中的所有节点。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Collapse%2A> method to programmatically collapse a node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Collapse%2A>方法以编程方式折叠中的节点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Book.xml.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Book.xml 文件。

trans-unit.source: The following code is sample XML data for the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码是前面的示例的示例 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: Collapses the current node and all its child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 折叠当前节点及其所有子节点。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.CollapseAll%2A> method to conveniently collapse the current node and all its child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.CollapseAll%2A>方法可以方便地折叠当前节点及其所有子节点。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A> property of the current node and each of its child nodes to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 作为替代方法，还可以设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A>以及当前节点及其子节点的每个属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: To collapse only the current node, consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Collapse%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要折叠只有当前节点，请考虑使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Collapse%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseAll%2A> will collapse all the nodes in the entire tree.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseAll%2A> 将折叠整个树中的所有节点。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.CollapseAll%2A> method to programmatically collapse a node and all its child nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.CollapseAll%2A>方法以编程方式折叠节点及其所有子节点中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Book.xml.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Book.xml 文件。

trans-unit.source: The following code is sample XML data for the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码是前面的示例的示例 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the node was created through data binding.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示节点是否是通过数据绑定创建的。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the node was created through data binding; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果节点是通过数据节点创建的，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.DataBound%2A> property is used to programmatically determine whether the node was created through data binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.DataBound%2A>属性用于以编程方式确定节点是否已创建数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: Because dynamic and static content cannot be mixed in the same node, this property is commonly used when populating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control dynamically to determine whether the node contains static content.
trans-unit.target: 填充时，因为不能动态和静态内容混合在同一节点，通常使用此属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件动态确定节点是否包含静态内容。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data item that is bound to the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取绑定到控件的数据项。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the data item that is bound to the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示绑定到控件的数据项。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that the node is not bound to any data item.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />，表示节点不绑定到任何数据项。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, such as an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> object, this property is set to the data item that is bound to this specific node.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件绑定到数据源，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>对象，此属性设置为绑定到此特定节点的数据项。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to access the values of the data item.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常用于访问数据项目的值。

trans-unit.source: This property is available only after data binding has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 仅在数据绑定发生后，此属性才可用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the path to the data bound to the node.
trans-unit.target: 获取绑定到节点的数据的路径。

trans-unit.source: The path to the data bound to the node.
trans-unit.target: 绑定到节点的数据的路径。

trans-unit.source: This value comes from the hierarchical data source control to which the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control is bound.
trans-unit.target: 此值来自 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控件绑定到的分层数据源控件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.DataPath%2A> property value is commonly used when calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to provide the path to the data bound to the current node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.DataPath%2A>调用时，通常使用属性值<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>绑定到当前节点的方法以提供对数据的路径。

trans-unit.source: This method then returns a <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView?displayProperty=nameWithType> object that contains the data at the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 然后，此方法返回<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView?displayProperty=nameWithType>对象，其中包含指定路径上的数据。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets the depth of the node.
trans-unit.target: 获取节点的深度。

trans-unit.source: The depth of the node.
trans-unit.target: 节点的深度。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Depth%2A> property to determine the depth of the node.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Depth%2A>属性来确定节点的深度。

trans-unit.source: The depth represents the number of levels of hierarchy between a node and the root node.
trans-unit.target: 深度表示节点和根节点之间的层次结构的级别的数。

trans-unit.source: For example, a root node has a depth of zero.
trans-unit.target: 例如，根节点具有的深度为零。

trans-unit.source: A child of the root node has a depth of one, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 根节点的子级的深度为一个，依次类推。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Depth%2A> property to determine the depth of a node.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Depth%2A>属性来确定节点的深度。

trans-unit.source: It initializes all nodes with a depth of one to a selected state.
trans-unit.target: 它具有一个为选中状态深度的所有节点进行都初始化。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Newsgroup.xml.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Newsgroup.xml 文件。

trans-unit.source: The following code is sample XML data for the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码是前面的示例的示例 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: Expands the current tree node.
trans-unit.target: 展开当前树节点。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expand%2A> method to conveniently expand the current node.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expand%2A>可以方便地展开当前节点的方法。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 作为替代方法，还可以设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: To expand the current node and all its child nodes, consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要展开当前节点及其所有子节点，请考虑使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandAll%2A> will expand all the nodes in the entire tree.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandAll%2A> 将扩展整个树中的所有节点。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expand%2A> method to programmatically expand a node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expand%2A>方法以编程方式展开中的节点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Book.xml.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Book.xml 文件。

trans-unit.source: The following code is sample XML data for the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码是前面的示例的示例 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: Expands the current node and all its child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 展开当前节点及其所有子节点。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A> method to conveniently expand the current node and all its child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A>方法可以方便地展开当前节点及其所有子节点。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A> property of the current node and each of its child nodes to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 作为替代方法，还可以设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A>以及当前节点及其子节点的每个属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: To expand only the current node, consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expand%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要仅展开当前节点，请考虑使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expand%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandAll%2A> will expand all the nodes in the entire tree.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandAll%2A> 将扩展整个树中的所有节点。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A> method to programmatically expand a node and all its child nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A>方法以编程方式展开节点及其所有子节点中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Book.xml.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Book.xml 文件。

trans-unit.source: The following code is sample XML data for the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码是前面的示例的示例 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否展开节点。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the node is expanded, <see langword="false" /> if the node is not expanded, or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已展开节点，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果尚未展开节点，则为 <see langword="false" /> 或 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A> property to specify or determine whether the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A>属性可指定或确定是否已展开节点。

trans-unit.source: You can expand and collapse a node by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expand%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Collapse%2A> methods, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 你可以展开和折叠节点通过调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expand%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Collapse%2A>方法，分别。

trans-unit.source: You can also expand and collapse a node and all its child nodes by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.CollapseAll%2A> methods, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以展开以及折叠节点及其所有子节点，通过调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.CollapseAll%2A>方法，分别。

trans-unit.source: Since the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A> property is a tri-state property, the following C# code snippet causes a compile error:
trans-unit.target: 由于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A>属性是三种状态属性，下面的 C# 代码段会导致编译错误：

trans-unit.source: While VB.Net implicitly casts the `Boolean` value to a `NullableBoolean`, C# does not.
trans-unit.target: 虽然 VB.Net 隐式强制转换`Boolean`值赋给`NullableBoolean`，C# 却没有。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is a best practice to explicitly check the state of the property.
trans-unit.target: 因此，它是一种最佳做法来显式检查该属性的状态。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code examples in Visual Basic and C# explicitly test the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Visual Basic 和 C# 中的以下代码示例显式测试的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following Visual Basic code example explicitly tests the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 Visual Basic 代码示例显式测试的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This example tests if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A> property is set to `True`; therefore `Nothing` and `False` fall through the `If` statement.
trans-unit.target: 此示例测试<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A>属性设置为`True`; 因此`Nothing`和`False`贯穿`If`语句。

trans-unit.source: This C# code example explicitly tests the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此 C# 代码示例显式测试的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This example tests if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A> property is set to `True`; therefore `Null` and `False` fall through the `If` statement.
trans-unit.target: 此示例测试<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A>属性设置为`True`; 因此`Null`和`False`贯穿`If`语句。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A> property to programmatically expand a node.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A>要以编程方式扩展一个节点属性。

trans-unit.source: It initializes all nodes with a depth of one to an expanded state.
trans-unit.target: 它具有一个为展开状态深度的所有节点进行都初始化。

trans-unit.source: Notice that when the root node is expanded, its child nodes are already expanded.
trans-unit.target: 请注意在展开的根节点后，尚未展开及其子节点。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Book.xml.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Book.xml 文件。

trans-unit.source: The following code is sample XML data for the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码是前面的示例的示例 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ToolTip text for the image displayed next to a node.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在节点旁边显示的图像的工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text for the image displayed next to a node.
trans-unit.target: 在节点旁边显示的图像的工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: When an image is displayed next to a node (when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> property is set), use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property to specify the ToolTip displayed when the user positions the mouse pointer over the image.
trans-unit.target: 当节点旁边显示的图像 (时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>属性设置)，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>属性指定当用户将鼠标指针定位图像上方时显示的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: 你指定的文本，提供可用来使控件更易于访问的映像的说明的辅助技术设备。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A> property to specify the ToolTip text for an image displayed next to a node.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageToolTip%2A>属性指定的节点旁边显示的图像的工具提示文本。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must provide your own images.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，你必须提供自己的映像。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed next to the node.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置节点旁显示的图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL to a custom image that is displayed next to the node.
trans-unit.target: 显示在节点旁边的自定义图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示尚未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> property to specify a custom image for the current node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>属性来指定中当前节点的自定义映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This image is displayed next to the node and can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client's browser supports that format.
trans-unit.target: 此图像将显示在节点旁边，可以是任何文件格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等），只要客户端的浏览器支持该格式。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A> property to provide a custom image for a node.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ImageUrl%2A>属性，节点中提供的自定义映像。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample XML data below to a file named Book.xml.
trans-unit.target: 对于此示例中正常工作，必须将下面的示例 XML 数据复制到一个名为 Book.xml 文件。

trans-unit.source: The following code is sample XML data for the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码是前面的示例的示例 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the node is saving changes to its view state.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示节点是否保存其视图状态更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control is marked to save its state; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件标记为保存其状态，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the state of the node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示节点状态。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the node.
trans-unit.target: 加载节点先前保存的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.LoadViewState%2A> is a helper method used to load the previously saved view state of the node
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.LoadViewState%2A> 是一个帮助器方法，用于加载节点的以前保存的视图状态

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to navigate to when the node is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置单击节点时导航到的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL to navigate to when the node is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 单击节点时导航到的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示尚未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: The text of a node can be in one of two modes: selection mode or navigation mode.
trans-unit.target: 节点的文本可采用两种模式之一： 选择模式或导航模式。

trans-unit.source: By default, a node is in selection mode.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，一个节点处于选择模式。

trans-unit.source: To put a node into navigation mode, set the node's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property to a value other than an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 若要将节点放入导航模式下，将设置该节点的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>属性为空字符串以外的值。

trans-unit.source: When a node is in navigation mode, all selection events are disabled for that node.
trans-unit.target: 在导航模式下一个节点时，将对该节点禁用所选内容的所有事件。

trans-unit.source: Clicking the node in navigation mode links the user to the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 单击导航模式中的节点可将用户链接到指定的 URL。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A> property to specify the window or frame in which to display the linked content.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择性地设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Target%2A>属性指定的窗口或框架中显示的链接的内容。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set up the frames for the next code example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置下一个代码示例的帧。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property to specify the URL to link to when the node is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>属性来指定要在单击节点时链接到的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This example is used within the frameset of the previous example to display a table of contents.
trans-unit.target: 此示例在上一示例框架集内用于显示的内容表。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前节点的父节点。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" /> that represents the parent node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode" />，表示当前节点的父节点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Parent%2A> property returns a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object that represents the parent node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Parent%2A>属性返回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象，表示当前节点的父节点。

trans-unit.source: It is commonly used to determine the parent node or to access the properties of the parent node.
trans-unit.target: 它通常用来确定父节点或访问父节点的属性。

trans-unit.source: A root node does not have a parent node.
trans-unit.target: 根节点没有父节点。

trans-unit.source: To access the child nodes of the current node, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问当前节点的子节点，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Parent%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property of the current node's parent node.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Parent%2A>属性来访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>当前节点的父节点的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the node is populated dynamically.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否动态填充节点。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to populate the node dynamically; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果动态填充节点，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input.
trans-unit.target: 有时，它是不可行静态预定义树形结构由于数据大小或依赖于用户输入的自定义内容。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control supports dynamic node population.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件支持动态节点填充。

trans-unit.source: When a node's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property is set to `true`, that node is populated at run time through a postback event when the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 当节点的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>属性设置为`true`，该节点内填充在运行时通过回发事件时该节点已展开。

trans-unit.source: To populate a node dynamically, an event-handling method that populates the node must be defined for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要动态填充一个节点，填充节点的事件处理方法必须为定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>事件。

trans-unit.source: Supported browsers can also take advantage of client-side node population.
trans-unit.target: 支持的浏览器还可以利用客户端节点填充。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, this allows the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to dynamically populate a node on the client when that node is expanded, which prevents the need to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用，这将允许<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件来动态填充客户端上的节点，展开该节点时，这会阻止需要回发到服务器。

trans-unit.source: For more information on client-side node population, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关客户端节点填充的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property to indicate that a node is populated dynamically.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>属性以指示节点动态填充。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that represents the output stream used to write content to a Web page.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />，表示用于向网页写入内容的输出流。

trans-unit.source: Allows control developers to add additional rendering to the node.
trans-unit.target: 允许控件开发人员向节点添加其他呈现。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by control developers to add additional rendering after the node is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 由控件开发人员来添加其他呈现在呈现节点后，可以重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that represents the output stream used to write content to a Web page.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />，表示用于向网页写入内容的输出流。

trans-unit.source: Allows control developers to add additional rendering to the node.
trans-unit.target: 允许控件开发人员向节点添加其他呈现。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by control developers to add additional rendering before the node is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 由控件开发人员来添加其他呈现在呈现节点之前，可以重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: Saves the current view state of the node.
trans-unit.target: 保存节点的当前视图状态。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the saved state of the node.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含已保存的节点状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SaveViewState%2A> method is a helper method called by the node to save its state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SaveViewState%2A>方法是调用要保存其状态的节点的帮助器方法。

trans-unit.source: Selects the current node in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 选择 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView" /> 控件中的当前节点。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Select%2A> method to select the current node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Select%2A>方法来选择中的当前节点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: **Note** As an alternative, you can also select the current node by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Selected%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: **请注意**作为替代方法，你还可以选择当前节点通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Selected%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Select%2A> method to select a node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Select%2A>方法来选择中的节点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the event or events to raise when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置选择节点时引发的事件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="TreeNodeSelectAction.Select" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="TreeNodeSelectAction.Select" />。

trans-unit.source: The text of a node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control can be in one of two modes: selection mode or navigation mode.
trans-unit.target: 中的节点的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件可以在两种模式之一中： 选择模式或导航模式。

trans-unit.source: By default, a node is in selection mode.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，一个节点处于选择模式。

trans-unit.source: To put a node into navigation mode, set the node's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property to a value other than an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 若要将节点放入导航模式下，将设置该节点的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>为空字符串以外的值的属性 ("")。

trans-unit.source: To put a node into selection mode, set the node's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 若要使一个节点处于选择模式，设置该节点的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>属性为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: When a node is in navigation mode, selection events are disabled for that node.
trans-unit.target: 在导航模式下一个节点时，将对该节点禁用选择事件。

trans-unit.source: Clicking a node will direct the user to the specified URL, rather than posting the page back to the server and raising an event.
trans-unit.target: 单击某个节点将用户定向到指定的 URL，而不是发布页面回发到服务器和引发事件。

trans-unit.source: When a node is in selection mode, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property to specify which event or events are raised when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 在选择模式下一个节点时，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>属性指定在选定节点时，将引发哪些事件。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available options.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的选项。

trans-unit.source: Selection action
trans-unit.target: 选择操作

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 切换展开和折叠状态之间的节点。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> event or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed> event as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>事件或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed>作为相应的事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises no events when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 在选定节点时不引发任何事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> event when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 在选定节点时引发 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> events when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 引发同时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>选定了一个节点时发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 仅展开节点，永远不会折叠。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A> property is not rendered for a node with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>属性不呈现的节点其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>属性设置为`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property to specify which event is raised when a node is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>属性指定单击节点时引发的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否选择节点。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the node is selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择节点，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Selected%2A> property to specify or determine whether the node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Selected%2A>属性指定或确定节点是否处于选定状态。

trans-unit.source: Although the property can be used to determine whether the node is selected, it is more common to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 尽管属性可以用于确定节点是否处于选定状态，但它是更常见的是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Only one node can be selected at a time in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control when using this property.
trans-unit.target: 只有一个节点可以在中的一次选择<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>时使用此属性控制。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can also select the node by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 作为替代方法，你还可以选择的节点通过使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Selected%2A> property to select a node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Selected%2A>属性以选择中的节点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a check box is displayed next to the node.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在节点旁显示一个复选框。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the check box; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果显示复选框，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control allows you to display a check box next to a node's image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件使你可以显示节点的映像旁的复选框。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A> property to show or hide the check box for the current node.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A>属性来显示或隐藏当前节点的复选框。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A> property can be used to display check boxes, it is more common to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A>属性可以用于显示复选框，则更常见的是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, however, affects every node type specified by the property; therefore, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is often used to override that setting for an individual node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，但是，会影响每个节点类型指定的属性; 因此，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性通常用于为重写该设置的单个节点。

trans-unit.source: Since the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is a tri-state property, the following C# code snippet causes a compile error:
trans-unit.target: 由于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性是三种状态属性，下面的 C# 代码段会导致编译错误：

trans-unit.source: While VB.Net implicitly casts the `Boolean` value to a `NullableBoolean`, C# does not.
trans-unit.target: 虽然 VB.Net 隐式强制转换`Boolean`值赋给`NullableBoolean`，C# 却没有。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is a best practice to explicitly check the state of the property.
trans-unit.target: 因此，它是一种最佳做法来显式检查该属性的状态。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code examples in Visual Basic and C# explicitly test the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Visual Basic 和 C# 中的以下代码示例显式测试的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A>属性。

trans-unit.target: 下面的 Visual Basic 代码示例显式测试的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This example tests if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A> property is set to `True`; therefore `Nothing` and `False` fall through the `If` statement.
trans-unit.target: 此示例测试<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A>属性设置为`True`; 因此`Nothing`和`False`贯穿`If`语句。

trans-unit.source: This C# code example explicitly tests the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此 C# 代码示例显式测试的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This example tests if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A> property is set to `True`; therefore `Null` and `False` fall through the `If` statement.
trans-unit.target: 此示例测试<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Expanded%2A>属性设置为`True`; 因此`Null`和`False`贯穿`If`语句。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ShowCheckBox%2A>属性以编程方式显示和隐藏中的节点的复选框<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。
